comments.message: Any actions to promote blood serum in a controlled way at care-centers are good. The problem as I understand it is 1) how to safely donate blood and take care of it given available conditions/equipment and 2) channel the black market donation of survival blood into controlled care-centers.

description: These are my thoughts about the proposed idea of the use of Convalescent Serum.  I believe that this idea is very good start to finding a useable vaccine to the Ebola virus.  We have evidence that this serum from Ebola survivors is effective in some patients suffering from the disease.  There is however, a controversy of whether or not the survivors would want to donate their blood.  I propose that we provide incentives of necessities such as water and nutritional food for the survivors.  This idea would hopefully result in more participation in survivor donations, therefore leading to more patients being treated.
summary: The serum sounds like a beneficial idea but we need to work on the participation of survivors.
title: Convalescent Serum Ideas
